page.title: 04EDUCATION HINTON ON GREEN
page.content: James and Julian aged five live at Hinton on the Green. They go to Sedgberrow First School. They get there by bicycle and bus.School begins at 08.50.There is a headmaster,2 female teachers and 3 classes. There are 15 pupils in their class. The lessons are reading, writing, mathematics, games and art and craft. James's favourite lesson is games. They both have reading homework. They have to wear grey or blue and have a school tie. School finishes at 15.20. James does gymnastics at school. They have a school library. They have been on a school trip to Bourton on the Water.They performed in a musical. They have 1 computer and 1 television. They take a packed lunch to school.
